appDesc.message: Do you like to play in racing? Then the game Car Racing is just for you. Excellent game is always in the browser!

lblRules.message: Dodge the cars and collect the coins, until the time is running out!

lblControls1.message: Use the up/down arrow keys to speed up/slow down.

lblControls2.message: Use the left/right arrow keys to steer.

lblStart.message: Press the Space Bar to start!

lblRestart.message: Press the Space Bar to try again!
